clause.label: DFARS 252.204-7012
clause.tip: Verify incident reporting, safeguarding controls, and required flow-downs.

clause.label: DFARS 252.204-7020 (SPRS / NIST score)
clause.tip: Confirm NIST 800-171 assessment/score and SPRS posting obligations.

clause.label: DFARS 252.204-7021 (CMMC)
clause.tip: Identify required CMMC level and certification timing/flow-down.

clause.label: NIST SP 800-171 (CUI safeguarding)
clause.tip: Detect explicit NIST 800-171 obligations and boundary impacts.

clause.label: RMF / ATO / NIST 800-53 expectations
clause.tip: Flag ATO/RMF expectations, evidence burden, and control inheritance.

clause.label: Privacy Act (5 USC 552a) / SORN
clause.tip: Identify Privacy Act applicability and System of Records implications.

clause.label: PII handling requirements
clause.tip: Detect PII handling, access, and protection requirements.

clause.label: HIPAA / PHI
clause.tip: Flag HIPAA/PHI constraints if present.

clause.label: GDPR (if referenced)
clause.tip: Flag GDPR obligations if referenced (mixed customer environments).

clause.label: US state privacy laws (CCPA/CPRA etc.)
clause.tip: Flag state privacy obligations and data handling requirements.

clause.label: Termination for convenience
clause.tip: Flag unilateral termination risk and wind-down obligations.

clause.label: Termination for default / cure period
clause.tip: Identify default triggers, cure periods, and remedies.

clause.label: Indemnification / hold harmless
clause.tip: Identify indemnity scope, exclusions, and negotiation posture.

clause.label: Limitation of liability / consequential damages
clause.tip: Capture liability caps/exclusions and risk posture.

clause.label: IP / Data Rights (DFARS 252.227*)
clause.tip: Identify IP/data rights allocation and deliverable rights posture.

clause.label: Cost-reimbursement / FAR 31 allowability
clause.tip: Identify allowable cost constraints and documentation burden.

clause.label: Firm Fixed Price (FFP)
clause.tip: Identify performance risk allocation and change impacts.

clause.label: Time & Materials (T&M) / labor category controls
clause.tip: Identify labor category constraints and invoicing rules.

clause.label: Certified cost or pricing data (TINA)
clause.tip: Flag pricing disclosure and compliance obligations.

clause.label: Invoicing system requirements (WAWF/iRAPT)
clause.tip: Capture invoice format, cadence, and acceptance workflow.

clause.label: Delivery milestones / schedule
clause.tip: Capture milestone dates and acceptance gates.

clause.label: SLAs / performance metrics
clause.tip: Identify operational SLAs and measurement method.

clause.label: Key personnel / staffing constraints
clause.tip: Capture key personnel constraints and substitution rules.

clause.label: Clearance requirements
clause.tip: Capture clearance levels and lead times.

clause.label: Phase-in / transition
clause.tip: Capture transition obligations and timelines.

context.label: Incident reporting timeline
context.tip: Extract reporting timelines, portals, and required recipients.

context.label: Security flow-downs to subs/suppliers
context.tip: Confirm subcontractor/supplier flow-down obligations and enforcement.

context.label: Encryption / FIPS requirements
context.tip: Identify encryption minimums and any FIPS validation requirements.

context.label: Vulnerability mgmt SLAs / remediation windows
context.tip: Capture scanning cadence and remediation timelines/SLAs.

context.label: Logging / SIEM / monitoring expectations
context.tip: Confirm log retention, monitoring expectations, and escalation paths.

context.label: Data minimization / least data
context.tip: Identify constraints on collection/processing and reduce retained data.

context.label: Consent / authorization to collect
context.tip: Identify consent requirements and how consent is recorded.

context.label: Retention / records schedule / deletion
context.tip: Capture retention obligations and deletion/disposal rules.

context.label: PII breach notification requirements
context.tip: Confirm reporting timelines + recipients for PII-related incidents.

context.label: Data residency / location constraints
context.tip: Identify geographic storage/processing constraints.

context.label: Governing law / venue
context.tip: Confirm governing law/venue and dispute forum.

context.label: Dispute resolution / claims process
context.tip: Identify dispute resolution path, timelines, and notice requirements.

context.label: Audit / inspection / records access
context.tip: Identify government/customer audit and inspection rights.

context.label: Changes clause / equitable adjustment
context.tip: Capture scope change mechanics and adjustment entitlements.

context.label: Assignment / novation restrictions
context.tip: Flag M&A/assignment constraints.

context.label: Payment terms / prompt payment
context.tip: Confirm net terms and prompt payment applicability.

context.label: Withholding / retainage
context.tip: Identify retainage and release triggers.

context.label: Indirect rate caps (OH/G&A)
context.tip: Flag indirect rate restrictions and pricing impact.

context.label: Travel reimbursement limits (JTR/GSA)
context.tip: Capture travel reimbursement rules and caps.

context.label: DCAA/DCMA audit exposure
context.tip: Identify audit requirements and record retention impacts.

context.label: Status reporting cadence
context.tip: Capture reporting cadence and required content.

context.label: Acceptance criteria / sign-off
context.tip: Confirm acceptance process and sign-off authority.

context.label: Subcontractor approval / consent to subcontract
context.tip: Identify subcontractor approval constraints.

context.label: Configuration management / change control
context.tip: Capture configuration control expectations.

context.label: Government-furnished equipment/data (GFE/GFI)
context.tip: Identify handling rules for government-furnished items.
